meanings.definition: Involving or relating to multiple currencies.
meanings.sent1: The company offers a multicurrency payment option for international customers.
meanings.sent2: She needed a multicurrency account to manage her finances while traveling.
meanings.sent3: The multicurrency calculator made converting money fun and easy.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a multicurrency exchange, constantly processing different ideas.
meanings.sent5: The multicurrency concept opened up new possibilities for global trade.

meanings.definition: Capable of being used with different currencies.
meanings.sent1: The new software update includes a multicurrency feature for users abroad.
meanings.sent2: Their multicurrency wallet allowed them to shop online from any country.
meanings.sent3: The multicurrency credit card felt like a passport to financial freedom.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a multicurrency charm, appealing to listeners from diverse backgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The multicurrency system transformed the way businesses conducted international transactions.
